mapper.sql: id, alarm_name, alarm_type, alarm_level, alarm_value, statistical_method, stifle_time, available_day, start_datetime, end_datatime, alarm_dependencies, alarm_desc, judgment_condition
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from alarm_config
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into alarm_config (id, alarm_name, alarm_type, alarm_level, alarm_value, statistical_method, stifle_time, available_day, start_datetime, end_datatime, alarm_dependencies, alarm_desc, judgment_condition) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{alarmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statisticalMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stifleTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{availableDay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDatatime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{alarmDependencies,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{alarmDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{judgmentCondition,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
